description: Thor was the Seventh Fist of Ragnarok. He joined Ragnarok in order to pursue his dream of making his combat-sumo style mainstream. After he is defeated by Ken`ichi, he honors Ken`ichi`s condition for the match, that he quit Ragnarok. He later joins the Shinpaku Alliance as a favor to Siegfried. He participates in the D of D tournament as part of the Alliance and is injured in the attempt to rescue Miu. He is named after Thor, the Norse thunder god.
name: Thor
